name: Mirror:The Lost Shards
description:
This is a game that combines match-3 and visual novel elements. You will enter the magical world of the Mirror and experience love and hate.

It is said that there is a magic mirror, which link the destines of many.
If you have it, you will be able to dive into the world of the beauties and experience this magnificent journey.
There is the dark elf, who was born in a noble family but has a rebellious nature, she enjoys bring the fairness and justice to people by robbing the rich and help the poor.
There is the shrine maiden, who keeps Kyoto in peace will serve the Gods for her whole life.
There is the jiangshi girl, who was sealed thousand years ago, would she find the long lost love?
There is prodigy of Taoism, who looks cool but how will his life be?
There is the dragon maiden, who grew up in a family of dragon riders. Will she accept fate or deny it?
There is the Shikigami, who was a spirit. Will it protect its master with life?
Game Characteristics:

Combines match-3 and AVG elements.
Traditional match-3 game mechanism, use skill gems to change the battle.
Unique gems that have different effects. Be sure to equip the right items and skills before you head on to your journey.
How the story goes is choice-based so your choices will ultimately decide the characters' fate. All endings have exquisite CGs and BGMs that you will never forget.
